Check our CS IT Support Wiki online documentation. If you still have questions or need to submit an IT support request, please email support@cs.jhu.edu . We are available 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Friday. Please note that the Computer Science Department’s IT Support Group is not the computer support group for the JHU campus at large. If you are in need of technical services outside of the CS Department, please contact JHU’s IT Services group (also reachable by phone at 410-516-HELP) or contact Whiting School of Engineering’s IT Services group .
